alert.note: Alert for Northern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hidalgo and northeastern Starr Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Santa Catarina, or 9 miles east of Viboras, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Viboras, Puerto Rico, La Gloria, La Reforma, Santa Catarina, San Isidro, Santa Elena, Delmita and Diamond O Ranch Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
